title: Third Law Hub Series - Crowne
content:
[[div class="window-box window-box-list"]]

[[=]]
[[# crowne]]
++ [[[crowne-thorne-hub|Crowne of Thornes]]]
[[/=]]

A series about dying in Three Portlands, suspected entrapment, journaling, oneirographs, inappropriate times to give campaign speeches, punching your dad, talking to birds, getting revenge, kidnapping ghosts, collecting an inheritance, threatening nuclear war, burglary, betrayal, loss, and attaining resolution. //Written by GreenWolf//

* **[[[crowne-thorne-hub| Hub and Prologue]]]**
 * **0. [[[funeral-for-the-phoenix| Funeral for the Phoenix]]]**
 * **1. [[[haunted-by-the-living| Haunted by the Living]]]**
 * **2. [[[much-belated-inheritance| A Much Belated Inheritance]]]**
 * **3. [[[memory-of-a-murder| Memory of a Murder]]]**
 * **4. [[[calling-on-the-blackbird| Calling on the Blackbird]]]**
 * **5. [[[where-it-all-ended| Where It All Ended]]]**
[[/div]]
author: GreenWolf
